title: Sampler, mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: over-casting and satin stitches, appliqué, cutwork
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: A bird in "plush work" surrounded by a wreath and flowering branches; the border is cut in tabs, each ornamented with a flower motif.
